name: Overdrive (itch) (island)
description:
In Overdrive, you fight to survive wave after wave of enemies in a claustrophobic arena. However, these enemies aren't just anybody: they're duplicates of yourself that mimic your actions.

Controls:
WASD - Move Player
R - Reset Game
LMB - Throw Ball
Hold LMB - Charge Throw

Credits:
Marc-Olivier Bélisle
Johnathan Butler
Ruiyu Gou
Emanuel Sharma
